item.title: What proof must credit card debt collectors provide for a debt?
item.description: Debt collectors must provide proof that a debt is valid. Otherwise, they have to stop their collection efforts.

item.title: U.S. Steel, Nippon file lawsuits over Biden's block of merger
item.description: U.S. Steel and Nippon Steel filed lawsuits Monday over President Joe Biden's blockage of the Japanese company's proposed takeover of its Pittsburgh-ba...

item.title: "The Brutalist," "Emilia Perez" and Demi Moore among Golden Globe winners
item.description: Demi Moore accepted her first-ever Golden Globe award for her role in the horror movie "The Substance." Other big winners include the musical "Emilia ...

item.title: Winter storm brings power outages, leaves utilities customers in the dark
item.description: Hundreds of thousands of households across southern and eastern U.S. states were without power Monday.

item.title: Congestion pricing begins in New York City
item.description: New York City's first-in-the-nation congestion pricing plan has gone into effect. CBS News reporter Elijah Westbrook has more.
